CustomField.description: Allows up to this amount of candidates to express interest in a single resource request. The default is up to 5 candidates being supported if no value or 0 is selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows up to this amount of candidates to express interest in a single resource request. The default is up to 5 candidates being supported if no value or 0 is selected.
CustomField.label: Candidate Limit
